data.current_description: Cancel a Job.
data.summary_suggestion: Cancel a running Cloud Batch Job
data.description_suggestion: Cancels a running Cloud Batch Job, stopping all associated tasks. The Job transitions to a cancelled state and no further tasks will be executed. Accepts a CancelJobRequest body. Returns the updated Job resource with cancelled status. Only jobs in running or queued states can be cancelled.
